feed.title: Google Cloud: Access Approval
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Access Approval

entry.content: Automotive AI Agent is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: The Automotive AI Agent has reached general availability. This feature provides advanced AI capabilities for the automotive industry, enabling new applications and insights. Explore the potential of AI in your automotive solutions today.
entry.title: Feature: Automotive AI Agent Now Available

entry.content: Workflows is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Workflows is now generally available. This feature allows you to orchestrate and automate services with a serverless, pay-as-you-go workflow service.
entry.title: Feature: Workflows is generally available

entry.content: Backup and DR Service is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: The Backup and DR Service has reached general availability, providing a robust solution for your data protection needs. This service offers comprehensive backup and disaster recovery capabilities to ensure business continuity and data resilience.
entry.title: Feature: Backup and DR Service Now Generally Available

entry.content: The new access insights feature is generally available (GA), allowing you to generate and download a single, filtered, organization-wide report of Google administrative access to your data.
entry.summary: A new feature, Access Insights, is now generally available. This feature allows users to generate and download a single, filtered, organization-wide report of Google administrative access to their data.
entry.title: Feature: New Access Insights Feature Now Available

entry.content: Artifact Analysis is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Artifact Analysis is now generally available, providing enhanced security insights for your software supply chain. This feature helps identify vulnerabilities and risks within your artifacts, ensuring greater protection for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Artifact Analysis Now Generally Available

entry.content: Backup and DR Service is available in Preview.
entry.summary: The Backup and DR Service has been launched and is currently available in Preview. This new service offers robust data protection capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: Backup and DR Service Now in Preview

entry.content: Cloud Scheduler is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Cloud Scheduler has reached general availability. This robust job scheduler allows you to manage scheduled tasks on Google Cloud.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud Scheduler Now Generally Available

entry.content: Vertex AI model tuning is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Vertex AI model tuning has reached general availability. This feature allows for enhanced model performance and optimization.
entry.title: Feature: Vertex AI Model Tuning Now GA

entry.content: IAM System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Service is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: The IAM SCIM Service is now generally available. This feature allows for streamlined cross-domain identity management.
entry.title: Feature: SCIM Service Now Generally Available

entry.content: Text-to-Speech is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Our text-to-speech offering has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Text-to-Speech is generally available

entry.content: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Google Cloud is excited to announce the general availability of its Managed Service for Apache Kafka. This fully managed service allows you to use the open-source platform you love, without the operational overhead. Get started today!
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available!

entry.content: IAM System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Service is available in Preview.
entry.summary: The SCIM API is now available for cross-domain identity management.
entry.title: Feature: SCIM API is now in Preview

entry.content: NCC Gateway is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: NCC Gateway has reached general availability. This feature is now ready for widespread use.
entry.title: Feature: NCC Gateway Now Available

entry.content: NCC Gateway is available in Preview.
entry.summary: NCC Gateway is now available in preview. This new feature allows for enhanced connectivity and management.
entry.title: Feature: NCC Gateway Now in Preview

entry.content: Certificate Manager is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that Certificate Manager is now generally available. This feature helps you manage TLS/SSL certificates for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Certificate Manager Now Generally Available

entry.content: Memorystore for Redis Cluster is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Memorystore for Redis Cluster has reached general availability. This feature offers a fully managed Redis cluster experience, enhancing performance and scalability for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Redis Cluster Now Generally Available

entry.content: Memorystore for Valkey is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Memorystore for Valkey has reached general availability. This means it is production-ready and available for use. availability.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Valkey is now generally available

entry.content: Cloud TPU is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Cloud TPU has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud TPU now generally available

entry.content: Access Approval supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway in the General Availability stage.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway

entry.content: Image streaming is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Image streaming has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Image streaming is now available

entry.content: Access Approval supports Web Risk in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now fully supports Web Risk, marking a significant enhancement for security and compliance. This feature is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Web Risk Support in Access Approval Reaches GA

entry.content: Access Approval supports Firebase Data Connect in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect in the general availability stage. This integration allows for enhanced security and control over data access within Firebase applications.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Approval supports Security Command Center Premium tier in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval has reached General Availability for Security Command Center Premium tier users. This integration provides enhanced security and control over data access.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval Now Generally Available for Security Command Center Premium Users

entry.content: Access Approval supports Firebase Data Connect in the Preview stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect
